summary: AN ORDINANCE related to the Department of Information Technology; removing a budget proviso that restricts an appropriation in the 2007 Adopted Budget, accepting the summary business case presented by the Department of Information Technology, authorizing the next phase of planning for the Technology Infrastructure Optimization project; and authorizing the carry forward of the 2007 appropriation for this project in the Department of Information Technology's Technology Leadership and Governance Budget Control Level into the 2008 fiscal year.
